4386.verse: وَإِنَّهُۥ|And indeed, it|112|129|1195$لَعِلْمٌ|surely (is) a knowledge|173|207|15543$لِّلسَّاعَةِ|of the Hour.|100|134|15544$فَلَا|So (do) not|97|131|208$تَمْتَرُنَّ|(be) doubtful|107|124|15545$بِهَا|about it,|77|106|1203$وَٱتَّبِعُونِ‌ۚ|and follow Me.|116|174|15546$هَـٰذَا|This|59|118|248$صِرَٲطٌ|(is the) Path|104|162|9778$مُّسْتَقِيمٌ|Straight.|85|114|9779$

4388.verse: وَلَمَّا|And when|85|91|852$جَآءَ|came|57|70|4023$عِيسَىٰ|Isa|81|94|831$بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ|with clear proofs,|136|148|880$قَالَ|he said,|72|84|309$قَدْ|`Verily,|69|82|1097$جِئْتُكُم|I have come to you|150|156|2880$بِٱلْحِكْمَةِ|with wisdom|101|111|10195$وَلِأُبَيِّنَ|and that I make clear|163|183|15548$لَكُم|to you|63|83|207$بَعْضَ|some|76|96|2330$ٱلَّذِى|(of) that which|121|141|138$تَخْتَلِفُونَ|you differ|99|109|2931$فِيهِ‌ۖ|in it.|50|114|32$فَٱتَّقُواْ|So fear|73|202|230$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|182|184$وَأَطِيعُونِ|and obey me.|112|176|2901$

4390.verse: فَٱخْتَلَفَ|But differed|97|106|11186$ٱلْأَحْزَابُ|the factions|104|123|11187$مِنۢ|from|50|69|53$بَيْنِهِمْ‌ۖ|among them,|106|125|15549$فَوَيْلٌ|so woe|67|86|749$لِّلَّذِينَ|to those who|108|127|750$ظَلَمُواْ|wronged|80|89|558$مِنْ|from|50|104|53$عَذَابِ|(the) punishment|134|241|1160$يَوْمٍ|(of the) Day|102|209|2331$أَلِيمٍ|painful.|68|122|2718$

4391.verse: هَلْ|Are|50|58|1829$يَنظُرُونَ|they waiting|102|118|1830$إِلَّا|except|65|81|86$ٱلسَّاعَةَ|(for) the Hour|112|128|9836$أَن|that|48|64|655$تَأْتِيَهُم|it should come on them|175|191|9295$بَغْتَةً|suddenly|78|86|5526$وَهُمْ|while they|88|190|256$لَا|(do) not|75|278|30$يَشْعُرُونَ|perceive?|105|207|88$

4392.verse: ٱلْأَخِلَّآءُ|Friends|85|102|15550$يَوْمَئِذِۭ|that Day,|83|117|3485$بَعْضُهُمْ|some of them|110|144|736$لِبَعْضٍ|to others|83|117|385$عَدُوٌّ|(will be) enemies|131|165|386$إِلَّا|except|65|82|86$ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ|the righteous,|113|113|1567$

4396.verse: يُطَافُ|Will be circulated|133|141|14612$عَلَيْهِم|for them|76|93|22$بِصِحَافٍ|plates|104|121|15552$مِّن|of|50|67|53$ذَهَبٍ|gold|68|85|10741$وَأَكْوَابٍ‌ۖ|and cups.|98|115|15553$وَفِيهَا|And therein|96|104|6329$مَا|(is) what|80|93|262$تَشْتَهِيهِ|desires|86|112|15554$ٱلْأَنفُسُ|the souls|83|109|4514$وَتَلَذُّ|and delights|100|126|15555$ٱلْأَعْيُنُ‌ۖ|the eyes,|83|109|15556$وَأَنتُمْ|and you|73|99|211$فِيهَا|therein|66|79|253$خَـٰلِدُونَ|will abide forever.|137|137|257$

4397.verse: وَتِلْكَ|And this|74|84|2028$ٱلْجَنَّةُ|(is) the Paradise|129|149|6405$ٱلَّتِىٓ|which|61|81|232$أُورِثْتُمُوهَا|you are made to inherit|175|195|6406$بِمَا|for what|76|96|43$كُنتُمْ|you used (to)|111|121|214$تَعْمَلُونَ|do.|92|92|725$

4386.verse: And indeed, Jesus will be [a sign for] knowledge of the Hour, so be not in doubt of it, and follow Me. This is a straight path.

4387.verse: And never let Satan avert you. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy.

4388.verse: And when Jesus brought clear proofs, he said, "I have come to you with wisdom and to make clear to you some of that over which you differ, so fear Allah and obey me.

4389.verse: Indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. This is a straight path."

4390.verse: But the denominations from among them differed [and separated], so woe to those who have wronged from the punishment of a painful Day.

4391.verse: Are they waiting except for the Hour to come upon them suddenly while they perceive not?

4392.verse: Close friends, that Day, will be enemies to each other, except for the righteous

4393.verse: [To whom Allah will say], "O My servants, no fear will there be concerning you this Day, nor will you grieve,

4394.verse: [You] who believed in Our verses and were Muslims.

4395.verse: Enter Paradise, you and your kinds, delighted."

4396.verse: Circulated among them will be plates and vessels of gold. And therein is whatever the souls desire and [what] delights the eyes, and you will abide therein eternally.

4397.verse: And that is Paradise which you are made to inherit for what you used to do.

4398.verse: For you therein is much fruit from which you will eat.
